name: Frogis FS12
headline: Portable line array PA system with 12" subwoofer
definition: Two-way powered portable line array PA system with 12" subwoofer, onboard mixer and DSP.
description: FS12 is a compact, plug-and-play column PA system that combines a slim 8 × 3.25" line array with a powerful 12" bass reflex subwoofer. Designed for fast setup and discreet visual presence, it delivers confident full-range sound for a wide range of applications.
story: Engineered for musicians, presenters, and rental use, FS12 balances portability with performance. The column array ensures excellent speech intelligibility and even coverage, while the 12" subwoofer provides solid low-frequency support—indoors or outdoors, from corporate environments to energetic live venues.
drivers: 8 × 3.25" line array drivers + 12" bass reflex subwoofer
features: Compact plug-and-play line array system
Discreet column design for inconspicuous installations
Line array configuration for consistent sound coverage
Two-way system with built-in DSP for EQ and dynamic limiting
High-efficiency 12" woofer for deep, powerful bass
Integrated handles for easy transport
Bluetooth connectivity for wireless playback
Integrated USB / SD MP3 player
Designed, engineered, and tuned in Italy

lifestyle.alt: FS12 column and 12-inch subwoofer system assembled
lifestyle.caption: A refined column profile with a matching 12" bass module—quick to deploy and easy to place.

items.label: Preamp
items.value: 2 onboard inputs with low noise and input limiter

items.label: Protections
items.value: Short circuit, thermal protection, overload, high-frequency output protection

name: Frogis FS15
headline: Portable Line Array PA System – Subwoofer 15”
description: A higher-output, plug-and-play column system featuring a 12 × 3.25” array and a 15” bass reflex subwoofer—sleek, travel-ready, and built for bigger rooms and bolder moments.
story: FS15 scales the same elegant column concept with more headroom and deeper authority. It stays fast to deploy, easy to control, and visually discreet—while delivering the impact required for lively indoor/outdoor events and demanding program material.
definition: Two-way powered portable line array PA system with 15” subwoofer, onboard mixer and DSP.
features: Compact Plug and Play line array System
Discreet look for inconspicuous use
Line array element configuration (12 x 3,25” speakers) offers exceptional sound coverage
Compact speaker system for concerts, conferences and events and more
Two-way speaker with built-in DSP for EQ and dynamic limiter
Extremely efficient 15’’ woofer driver provides incredibly deep bass and acoustic power.
Equipped with handles for easy carrying
Provided with Bluetooth technology
Delivers 90° of horizontal coverage and 10° vertical coverage
Integrated USB/SD MP3 player
Designed, engineered and tuned in Italy
applications: All sizes of indoor/outdoor live event
specs: Transducers: Low Frequency 15’’ bass reflex / High Frequency 12x3.25’’ array
Preamp: 2 IN on-board with low noise; Balanced DSP output on CH2; Input limiter; Phantom power on mic inputs (12Vdc)
Crossover: Two-way speaker with built-in DSP for EQ and dynamic limiter
Amplifiers: Power Voltage 100-240 Vac , 50-60 Hz; Operating Voltage 90 - 264 V; Power Factor cosΨ = 0,9@360W
Max Output @ 1% sine 1Khz: 600 W (@ 4 Ω ) + 600 W ( @ 4 Ω )
Protections: Short Circuit , Thermal Protection ( Power Limiting - Thermal shutdown ) , Overload, High frequency output protection
System size W/H/L: 43 cm x 206 cm x 60 cm (16.9”x 81.1”x 23.6”)
Woofer size W/H/L: 43 cm x 42 cm x 60 cm (16.9”x 16.5”x 23.6”)

lifestyle.alt: FS15 slimline column system with 15-inch subwoofer
lifestyle.caption: A taller column and larger bass module—more headroom for ballrooms, stages, and open-air sets.

name: Frogis FS4D
headline: 53 cm active Array (4 × 3.25") with Dante audio network
description: An active slimline array with built-in Dante networking—designed for modern installed systems that demand clean routing, long runs, and consistent coverage.
story: FS4D combines the FS column aesthetic with network audio capability, supporting structured installations where control, scalability, and neat infrastructure matter as much as sound.
definition: Active slimline array module with Dante audio network connectivity.
type: Active array with Dante audio network
features: Build-in Dante audio network protocol module
Single-stage power conversion(DC-AC)
Soft switching technology
Bidirectional energy recovery technology
Precise PSM(Phase Modulation) technology
Discreet look for inconspicuous use
Line array element configuration (4 x 3,25” speakers) offers exceptional sound coverage
Compact speaker line array for school, church, conference, large hall, public area, airport and back ground music and more
Delivers 120° of horizontal coverage and 20° vertical coverage with and a very long acoustic throw capacity
IPX4 waterproof rating is good for indoor and outdoor installation

name: Frogis FS4IP
headline: 53 cm Array (4 × 3") with 100V & 8Ω mode Selection, Full Weather IP56
description: A weather-rated slimline array engineered for clear speech and elegant wall integration, with flexible 100V/8Ω selection for varied system architectures.
story: FS4IP addresses the common aesthetic compromise of traditional conference speakers by delivering a sleek wall-mounted alternative—while remaining robust enough for humid or lightly exposed outdoor environments.
definition: IP56-rated slimline array with 100V / 8Ω selection for installed speech and background-music systems.
applications: Speech reinforcement systems for small to medium-sized video conference rooms
Humid or lightly exposed outdoor environments (covered plazas or semi-open auditoriums)
features: Streamlined Aesthetics & Functionality: The array sound column boasts a streamlined design that balances visual appeal with practicality, making it a versatile fit for sound reinforcement in various architectural environments while delivering clear, pleasant audio.
Robust Construction: Its enclosure is crafted from ABS mixed with glass fiber-reinforced material, ensuring exceptional durability and resistance to daily wear and tear.

Enhanced Acoustic Performance: The front circular waveguide holes, paired with the enclosure’s damping ports, create a unique cardioid low-frequency dispersion pattern. This design results in crisp high frequencies, natural and rich midtones, and full, well-defined bass, elevating speech clarity and music reproduction.
High-Powered Drivers: Equipped with 4 × 3-inch high-performance drive units, optimized for consistent and reliable sound output.

All-Weather Durability IP56-Rated: An optional UV waterproof coating extends its usability to both indoor and outdoor settings. For added safety, optional UL94V-0 flame-retardant materials are available.
Convenient Accessories: Optional add-ons such as a level device, handle, and shock-absorbing rubber pads simplify installation and maintenance, enhancing user convenience.

lifestyle.caption: A sleek, IP56-rated column that keeps walls clean while keeping speech clear.
